alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 25 at 3:25PM EDT until March 25 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Houston County in southeastern Alabama... North central Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... North central Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... Miller County in southwestern Georgia... Southwestern Early County in southwestern Georgia... Northern Seminole County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 415 PM EDT/315 PM CDT/. * At 325 PM EDT/225 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Donalsonville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Colquitt, Donalsonville, Malone, Gordon, Iron City, Brinson, Jakin, Bascom, Saffold, Ausmac, Babcock, Crosby, Little Hope, Mayhaw, Decatur Co A/P, Boykin, Riverturn, Sharphagen, Hornsville and Donaldsonville A/P. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
